author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,'DI NI SPOBS PA DGE BA CAN, ,BSHES GNYEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, ,DRIS PA'I LAN DU GYI NA PA, ,DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS PHUL, ,DZA YANTU, ,AOm SVA STI,  TSUL 'DI BSTAN SGRON NO MIN HANG GI SLOB, ,MKHYEN YANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,RNAM SAD @016B 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,THEG MCHOG BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SA LAM BGROD PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
